scripts.browserify: mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/glance-selector.js -o dist/glance-selector.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/glance-selector.js -o dist/glance-selector-min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -d -p [minifyify --map dist/bundle.js.map --output dist/bundle.js.map]
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && node_modules/.bin/pegjs src/glance.pegjs src/parser.js && babel src -d lib
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git fetch https://github.com/quasimatic/glance-selector-js.git gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push https://github.com/quasimatic/glance-selector-js.git gh-pages --force
